name: Shimla
description: Popular hill station known for its colonial architecture, scenic beauty, and Mall Road shopping.

name: Manali
description: Famous for adventure sports, Hadimba Temple, and scenic views of Beas River and Solang Valley.

name: Darjeeling
description: Renowned for tea gardens, Toy Train, Tiger Hill sunrise view, and stunning vistas of Kanchenjunga.

name: Mussoorie
description: Known as the 'Queen of Hills' with attractions like Kempty Falls, Gun Hill, and Lal Tibba.

name: Nainital
description: Scenic hill station surrounding Naini Lake, Naina Devi Temple, and Naini Peak viewpoints.

name: Ooty
description: Popular for its Nilgiri Mountain Railway, Botanical Gardens, and picturesque landscapes.

name: Munnar
description: Famous for tea plantations, Eravikulam National Park, and Anamudi Peak.

name: Kodaikanal
description: Known for its scenic beauty, Kodaikanal Lake, Coaker's Walk, and Bryant Park.

name: Gulmarg
description: Renowned for skiing, Gondola rides, and beautiful landscapes in the Pir Panjal range.

name: Gangtok
description: Capital of Sikkim offering monasteries, scenic viewpoints, and trekking opportunities.

name: Leh
description: Gateway to Ladakh known for monasteries, high-altitude treks, and breathtaking landscapes.

name: Auli
description: Famous for skiing, cable car rides, and panoramic views of Himalayan peaks like Nanda Devi.

name: Coorg
description: Known as the 'Scotland of India' with coffee plantations, waterfalls, and Abbey Falls.

name: Kullu
description: Valley known for adventure sports, scenic beauty, and temples like Raghunath Temple.

name: Ladakh
description: High-altitude desert offering adventure activities, monasteries, and stunning landscapes.

name: Almora
description: Hill town known for temples, panoramic views of Himalayas, and Kasar Devi Temple.

name: Matheran
description: Vehicle-free hill station offering scenic points, toy train rides, and sunset views.

name: Mount Abu
description: Rajasthan's only hill station famous for Dilwara Temples, Nakki Lake, and sunset point.

name: Pahalgam
description: Picturesque valley known for Betaab Valley, Lidder River, and Aru Valley.

name: Kalimpong
description: Peaceful hill station offering views of Himalayan ranges, monasteries, and flower nurseries.

name: Nandi Hills
description: Popular weekend getaway near Bangalore with viewpoints, temples, and paragliding.

name: Rishikesh
description: Famous for yoga, adventure sports, spiritual sites, and the Ganges riverbank.

name: Kasauli
description: Quiet hill station known for its colonial architecture, Christ Church, and Monkey Point.

name: Lansdowne
description: Offbeat hill station offering peace, trekking trails, and panoramic views of Shivalik range.

name: Yercaud
description: Serenely beautiful hill station with Yercaud Lake, botanical garden, and viewpoints.

name: Chamba
description: Scenic hill town known for temples, lakes, and panoramic views of Himalayas.

name: Patnitop
description: Hill station offering adventure sports, Nathatop viewpoints, and Nag Temple.

name: Wayanad
description: Picturesque hill district known for wildlife sanctuaries, waterfalls, and Edakkal Caves.

name: Kasol
description: Famous for hippie culture, trekking trails, Parvati River, and Manikaran Sahib Gurudwara.

name: Tawang
description: Remote hill station famous for Tawang Monastery, Sela Pass, and stunning natural beauty.

name: Kufri
description: Scenic hill station offering skiing, hiking, and panoramic views of Himalayan peaks.

name: Mashobra
description: Quieter alternative to Shimla with apple orchards, hiking trails, and Craignano Nature Park.

name: Coonoor
description: Quaint hill station known for tea gardens, Sim's Park, and viewpoints like Dolphin's Nose.

name: Srinagar
description: Capital of Jammu and Kashmir with Dal Lake, Mughal gardens, and houseboat stays.

name: Pelling
description: Scenic town with views of Kanchenjunga, Pemayangtse Monastery, and Sangachoeling Monastery.

name: Narkanda
description: Skiing destination offering apple orchards, Hatu Peak, and views of Himalayan ranges.

name: Dharamshala
description: Home to Dalai Lama, Tibetan culture, Bhagsunag Temple, and scenic Kangra Valley.

name: Lonavala
description: Popular weekend getaway near Mumbai known for Bhushi Dam, Tiger's Leap, and Lohagad Fort.

name: Gulaba
description: Scenic spot en route to Rohtang Pass offering snow activities and stunning landscapes.

name: Horsley Hills
description: Quiet hill station in Andhra Pradesh known for viewpoints, Mallamma Temple, and nature trails.

name: Chikmagalur
description: Famous for coffee plantations, Mullayanagiri Peak, Baba Budangiri, and Hebbe Falls.

name: Dhanaulti
description: Offbeat hill station with Eco Park, Surkanda Devi Temple, and breathtaking Himalayan views.

name: Kanatal
description: Scenic hill station offering camping, trekking, and views of snow-capped peaks.

name: Panchgani
description: Hill station known for strawberry farms, Table Land, and views of Krishna Valley.

name: Nagarkot
description: Scenic hill station near Kathmandu offering views of Himalayas, sunrise, and sunset.

name: Tirthan Valley
description: Offbeat destination in Himachal Pradesh offering trout fishing, trekking, and serenity.
